Adi Suite 0.1
=============

This product will add a content-type 'Suite' to your portal.

In a suite you can add several galleries, containing mixed contenttypes and file-formats.

Currently supported contenttypes in a popup-display:

- Image
- File
- Page
- News-Item

Currently supported file-formats in a popup-display:

- all common image-formats
- mp4 and flv for movies
- mp3 for audio
- swf for flash-animations

Note: This product will add an additonal image-preview-size to your plonsite-settings (image handling). In case you have already customized these settings, please backup your setting before installing, because it will override formerly made customizations.

Credits: fancybox.net, flowplayer.org, plone.org, ida-ebkes.eu.
